sub_title: Writer || Researcher in religious theology & philosophy || Political Analyst "Expert in EU & Middle Eastern Affairs" || Modern Freethinker || Social Media Influencer & Content Creator
summary:
Master graduate in international relations specialized in European Union affairs, working to better understand the nature of terrorism and its threat to the international democratic order. 
My expertise includes data analysis and interpretation, and the development and implementation of research tools. 
I enjoy generating new ideas and devising feasible solutions to broadly relevant problems. 
My colleagues would describe me as a driven, resourceful individual who maintains a positive, proactive attitude when faced with adversity. 
Currently, I’m seeking new creative & original ways to develop and promote new professional and personal skills and concretely contribute to global peace and justice. 
Specific fields of interest include Health and environmental international issues, history, and geopolitics of the middle east, terrorist and criminal organizations, EU foreign policy, and US foreign policy.

📧 : georges.beik1@hotmail.com

awards.title: Award in Political Culture
awards.description:
The Lebanese forces, a Lebanese political party, organize workshops and forums which take place every year at the party Headquarter - Meerab, Lebanon - and where students and political leaders come together to discuss Lebanese political, social, and economic issues and propose relevant solutions.

I have participated in more than 6 workshops and events and had both project and quiz excellent results. 

Thanks to this experience, I was able to deepen my knowledge of Lebanese domestic issues. I was able to gain a better understanding of the Lebanese political system and history, and a primary experience in working inside a political party.

awards.title: MUN Honourable Mention Award
awards.description:
Change the World Model United Nations, is a unique forum organized by an Italian NGO, "Associazione Diplomatici", which takes place every year at the United Nations Headquarters - New York - and where students, political leaders, sports champions and geopolitical experts come together to discuss current international topics, future cooperation, and sustainability.

First, I received the highest scholarship, by "Associazione Diplomatici", on the basis of my vast knowledge in the functioning of international organizations.

I also received an honorable mention for representing the delegation of "Burundi" within the Committee of the World Health Organization. More than 70 delegations participated in debates to discuss 3 specific topics: climate change, non-communicable diseases, and illegal consumption of marijuana and their impacts on human health, in order to draft, vote, and adopt resolutions adapted to each subject.

Mention was awarded for:
- Excellence in public speaking
- Unique ability to unify opposing beliefs and positions
- Strong presence at all levels
- Delegates retaining their character (great knowledge of diplomatic traditions and protocols, international conventions, national policies, history, culture, etc.)
- Responsible leadership
- Very good individual performance
- Very good teamwork

Thanks to this extraordinary experience, I was able to deepen my knowledge in the work of international organizations. I was able to gain a better understanding of the meaning of respect, tolerance, and coexistence between world citizens of different cultures, faiths, or ethnicities. In general, I can say with pride that I have been able to train myself in secondary skills for the global world of work and concentrate more on upholding democratic values.

profile_positions.description:
Main responsibilities 

- Pulling and packing products based on daily orders. 
- Meeting specifics of customer orders in a timely manner. 
- Keeping products separated, organized, and in good rotation. 
- Monitoring product quality frequently, reporting problems to mitigate safety issues. 

Accomplishments :

- I participated in the instauration of a new organization within Hub I worked in and had strong innovative ideas that helped my co-workers and me enjoying a well-organized, clean and, both mentally and physically healthy working environment. 
- I remember once staying for more than 15 hours, on Sunday, to replace another employee, and the only reason I did it, was because I was fully dedicated to my work, loyal to my managers whom I had close ties with and because my constant main concern was to deliver the most perfect results that will reflect a good image of our company.
profile_positions.title: Superviser / Food industry

profile_positions.description:
Main responsibilities : 

- Direct responsible for purchasing parts abroad.
- Ensuring good relationships between our customers and our workers. 
- Setting the objectives to be achieved and the main strategies of the company.
- Taking care of logistics: Buying parts and cars in France or Europe, requesting a transport service, maintaining relationships with customs services, both abroad and in Lebanon. 
- Supervising customer services: sales service and mechanical repair service.
- Assisting the accounting officer on financial matters and corporate banking relations.
- Maintaining relationships with business managers abroad and negotiation.  

My biggest achievement was to save this company from bankruptcy.

profile_positions.description:
As a sports coach during summer school at SABIS - International School I had to :
- Watch over students between 6 and 13-year-old. 
- Plan, organize and deliver an appropriate range of sports activities and programs for the different groups.
- Promote discipline and physical self-care.
profile_positions.title: Sports Coach

volunteer_experiences.description:
I helped volunteers from "SOS Chrétiens d'Orient" to communicate with Lebanese and Syrian children by doing the necessary translations. I also participated in the organization of various events with the association, such as the “Day of the Games”, which took place in a rural area of northern Lebanon. 

J'ai aidé des volontaires de «SOS Chrétiens d'Orient» à communiquer avec des enfants libanais et syriens en faisant les traductions nécessaires. J'ai également participé à l'organisation de divers événements avec l'association, comme la «Journée des Jeux», qui s'est déroulée dans une zone rurale du nord du Liban.

Main responsibilities:

- Supporting the establishment of a system of sponsorship of foreign students by graduate students;
- Informing students;
- Guiding the public at the university;
- Encouraging the voice of international students during friendly exchanges;
- Participating in the launch of French "FLE" courses for international students, including refugees and asylum seekers.

Achievements:

- Performed with enthusiasm tasks that were not part of my job description.
- Functioned with a strong work ethic, professionalism, and ability to work under pressure.
- Worked in an organized and prioritized manner to complete assignments in a timely and efficient manner.
- Served as a friendly, hardworking, and punctual employee.
- Participated in the launch of French as a foreign language (FLE) courses.
- Assisted in the organization of special events and conferences such as honoring “foreign countries and cultures”, " how to reduce our garbage ?".
- Hosting important guests and personalities.
